message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game.
You can't expect a better offer than a 50/50 split so early on!
You're right, 50/50 is a fair split, but I'm willing to take a bit more to account for the inflation.
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm not falling for it. This is my next best offer.
I'm willing to take a bigger risk and go for a more uneven split. Will you accept?
You're getting desperate, I can tell. This is my next best offer, don't expect a better one.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm still hoping for a fair deal. Will you meet me in the middle?
You're running out of time, Alice. This is my last serious offer. Take it or leave it.
